content: catventurous crochet simple and fun crochet patterns for #fashionablycatventurous kitties supermeowdel catventurer melba @catventurepussmelba welcome to this beginner-friendly video tutorial for our tofino ribbed keyhole cat scarf thanks so much for watching and happy crocheting materials * yarn of your choice i have used 4 weight acrylic 80%/wool 20% blend * crochet hook to suit your yarn i used 5mm * darning needle * scissors * measuring tape stitches/techniques * slip knot onto hook * making a chain * single_crochet single_crochet * half_double_crochet half_double_crochet * half_double_crochet in back loop only blo * working into the 3rd loop of a chain optional * invisible finishing stitch * weaving in ends **important these scarves are intended to be stylish and fun for you and your cat for their safety please supervise your cat at all times while they are wearing this scarf or any other item that secures around the neck **
